List120.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: "Destroyer" Rocket Rack-III,"Thunder" Missile Pod-III)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-27

List123.Name: Doomsday Nuclear Launcher-I

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: "Destroyer" Rocket Rack-III,"Thunder" Missile Pod-III)

List162.Name: Ship Reinforcement Facility-I
List162.Comment: Primary component used to strengthen a warship's hull and defenses. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>210</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.1</font> to overall ship defense.
List162.Comment2: Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item.

List163.Name: Ship Reinforcement Facility-II
List163.Comment: Primary component used to strengthen a warship's hull and defenses. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>240</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.2</font> to overall ship defense.
List163.Comment2: Requires Ship Reinforcement Facility-I to be researched.

List164.Name: Ship Reinforcement Facility-III
List164.Comment: Primary component used to strengthen a warship's hull and defenses. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>280</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.3</font> to overall ship defense.
List164.Comment2: Requires Ship Reinforcement Facility-II to be researched.

List165.Name: Gravity Maint. Facility-I
List165.Comment: A Gravity Maint. Facility improves warship stability. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>500</font> to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.4</font> to overall ship defense, <font color='#00FF00'>+20%</font> to ship stability rate. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List165.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Ship Reinforcement Facility-II)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-2

List166.Name: Gravity Maint. Facility-II
List166.Comment: A Gravity Maint. Facility improves warship stability. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>700</font> to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.7</font> to overall ship defense, <font color='#00FF00'>+35%</font> to ship stability rate. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List166.Comment2: Requires Gravity Maint. Facility-I to be researched.

List167.Name: Gravity Maint. Facility-III
List167.Comment: A Gravity Maint. Facility improves warship stability. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>1000</font> to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+1</font> to overall ship defense, <font color='#00FF00'>+50%</font> to ship stability rate. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List167.Comment2: Requires Gravity Maint. Facility-II to be researched.

List168.Name: Hull Maintenance Mechanic-I
List168.Comment: This automatic repair unit is a necessity for any ship. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>30</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.1</font> to overall ship defense.
List168.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Ship Reinforcement Facility-I)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-14

List169.Name: Hull Maintenance Mechanic-II
List169.Comment: This automatic repair unit is a necessity for any ship. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>50</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.1</font> to overall ship defense.
List169.Comment2: Requires Hull Maintenance Mechanic-I to be researched.

List170.Name: Hull Maintenance Mechanic-III
List170.Comment: This automatic repair unit is a necessity for any ship. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>80</font> points to the hull, <font color='#00FF00'>+0.1</font> to overall ship defense.
List170.Comment2: Requires Hull Maintenance Mechanic-II to be researched.

List171.Name: Quick Reaction Armor-I
List171.Comment: Used in emergencies when normal armor modules have been damaged or are not working. The instant an enemy activates their first type of weapon or an attack is approaching, this armor will break off to block the attack, reducing damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>30%</font>. Requires <font color='#00FF00'>5</font> rounds to cool down. (Only 1 module of this type can be installed.)
List171.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Gravity Maint. Facility-III）
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-23

List172.Name: Quick Reaction Armor-II
List172.Comment: Used in emergencies when normal armor modules have been damaged or are not working. The instant an enemy activates their first two types of weapons or an attack is approaching, this armor will break off to block the attack, reducing damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>40%</font>. Requires <font color='#00FF00'>4</font> rounds to cool down. (Only 1 module of this type can be installed.)
List172.Comment2: Requires Quick Reaction Armor-I to be researched.

List173.Name: Quick Reaction Armor-III
List173.Comment: Used in emergencies when normal armor modules have been damaged or are not working. The instant an enemy activates their first three types of weapons or an attack is approaching, this armor will break off to block the attack, reducing damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>50%</font>. Requires <font color='#00FF00'>3</font> rounds to cool down. (Only 1 module of this type can be installed.)
List173.Comment2: Requires Quick Reaction Armor-II to be researched.

List174.Name: Reflective Plating-I
List174.Comment: This automatically activated shield will reflect damage from the first threat directed at the ship itself. Returns <font color='#00FF00'>20%</font> of damage received to the agressor. This component will only function for <font color='#00FF00'>1</font> time for each combat. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List174.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Gravity Maint. Facility-III)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-20

List175.Name: Reflective Plating-II
List175.Comment: This automatically activated shield will reflect damage from the first threat directed at the ship itself. Returns <font color='#00FF00'>30%</font> of damage received to the agressor. This component will only function for <font color='#00FF00'>1</font> time for each combat. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List175.Comment2: Requires Reflective Plating-I to be researched.

List176.Name: Reflective Plating-III
List176.Comment: This automatically activated shield will reflect damage from the first threat directed at the ship itself. Returns <font color='#00FF00'>40%</font> of damage received to the agressor. This component will only function for <font color='#00FF00'>1</font> time for each combat. (Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List176.Comment2: Requires Reflective Plating-II to be researched.

List177.Name: Energy Armor-I
List177.Comment: Gathers energy to negate incoming attacks to the ship. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>20</font> points of damage, <font color='#00FF00'>+15%</font> to ship stability. (Activates when shields are ineffective)
List177.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Gravity Maint. Facility-II)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-23

List178.Name: Energy Armor-II
List178.Comment: Gathers energy to negate incoming attacks to the ship. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>30</font> points of damage, <font color='#00FF00'>+17%</font> to ship stability. (Activates when shields are ineffective)
List178.Comment2: Requires Energy Armor-I to be researched.

List179.Name: Energy Armor-III
List179.Comment: Gathers energy to negate incoming attacks to the ship. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>45</font> points of damage, <font color='#00FF00'>+20%</font> to ship stability. (Activates when shields are ineffective)
List179.Comment2: Requires Energy Armor-II to be researched.

List180.Name: Daedalus Control System-I
List180.Comment: Cutting-edge armor technology that controls and maintains the ship's structural integrity. Activates when shields are ineffective. Reduces all damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>5%</font>, <font color='#00FF00'>+100%</font> to ship stability, <font color='#00FF00'>+1</font> to overall ship defense. (Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.)
List180.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Quick Reaction Armor-II,Reflective Plating-II)
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-29

List181.Name: Daedalus Control System-II
List181.Comment: Cutting-edge armor technology that controls and maintains the ship's structural integrity. Activates when shields are ineffective. Reduces all damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>12%</font>, <font color='#00FF00'>+150%</font> to ship stability, <font color='#00FF00'>+1.5</font> to overall ship defense. (Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.)
List181.Comment2: Requires Daedalus Control System-I to be researched.

List182.Name: Daedalus Control System-III
List182.Comment: Cutting-edge armor technology that controls and maintains the ship's structural integrity. Activates when shields are ineffective. Reduces all damage taken by <font color='#00FF00'>20%</font>, <font color='#00FF00'>+200%</font> to ship stability, <font color='#00FF00'>+2</font> to overall ship defense. (Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.)
List182.Comment2: Requires Daedalus Control System-II to be researched.

List183.Name: Energy Shield Booster-I
List183.Comment: A basic upgrade accessory for shields. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>200</font> points to your shield, and increases the effectiveness of other shields by <font color='#00FF00'>1</font>.

List185.Name: Energy Shield Booster-III

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Energy Shield Booster-II)

List192.Name: Space-Time Magnetic Shield-I

List195.Name: Detonator Shield-I
List195.Comment: Provides excellent defense against explosives. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>80</font> points to your shield, and negates <font color='#00FF00'>10</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>40</font> additional points of explosive damage.

List197.Name: Detonator Shield-III
List197.Comment: Provides excellent defense against explosives. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>120</font> points to your shield, and negates <font color='#00FF00'>20</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>50</font> additional points of explosive damage.

List198.Name: Shield Regenerator-I
List198.Comment: This system can restore <font color='#00FF00'>40</font> points to shields at its current level.

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Energy Shield Booster-I)

List200.Name: Shield Regenerator-III

List201.Name: Eos Phase Shift Shield-I
List201.Comment: The epitome of shielding and defensive systems, this features a constantly rotating forcefield, adding <font color='#00FF00'>100</font> points to shields and absorbing <font color='#00FF00'>30</font> damage at its current level.

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Particle Stun Shield-I,Heat Diffusion Shield-I,Space-Time Magnetic Shield-I,Detonator Shield-I)

List204.Name: Agility Booster-I

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item.

List205.Name: Agility Booster-II
List205.Comment: This advanced technology improves a ship's agility by <font color='#00FF00'>+1.5</font>. (Ship Agility lessens damage received.Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)

List206.Name: Agility Booster-III

List206.Comment2: Requires Agility Booster-II to be researched.

List207.Name: Infrared Scanner-I
List207.Comment: Locks onto a target more effectively by detecting thermal emissions. Steering power <font color='#00FF00'>+1</font> bonus. (Steering power increases attack damage. Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.)
List207.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item.
How to obtain: Golden Treasure Box-11

List208.Name: Infrared Scanner-II

List308.Comment: Using the latest turbo twin-thrusters, the Dark Specter ships engage in the fastest ingress-egress movement. It's sufficiently powerful for extended periods away from the carrier.

You must research the Nebula-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Obtained from: Virgo Constellation Instance. V.04

List309.Name: Dark Specter-II
List309.Comment: Using the latest turbo twin-thrusters, the Dark Specter ships engage in the fastest ingress-egress movement. It's sufficiently powerful for extended periods away from the carrier.

List310.Name: Dark Specter-III
List310.Comment: Using the latest turbo twin-thrusters, the Dark Specter ships engage in the fastest ingress-egress movement. It's sufficiently powerful for extended periods away from the carrier.

List311.Name: Chronus Wing-I
List311.Comment: The technology developed into these unmanned ships allows them to appear in and out of the battle zone without a trace. The effectiveness of these fighters is as incredible as the amount of energy they consume.
List311.Comment2:
You must research the Space Citadel-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Obtained from: Virgo Constellation Instance. V.04

List312.Name: Chronus Wing-II
List312.Comment: The technology developed into these unmanned ships allows them to appear in and out of the battle zone without a trace. The effectiveness of these fighters is as incredible as the amount of energy they consume.

List313.Name: Chronus Wing-III
List313.Comment: The technology developed into these unmanned ships allows them to appear in and out of the battle zone without a trace. The effectiveness of these fighters is as incredible as the amount of energy they consume.

List314.Name: Sagan Kinetics Shield-I
List314.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of kinetic-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>90</font>points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>25</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>85</font> additional points of kinetic damage.
List314.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Particle Stun Shield-III)
How to obtain: Constellation Instance-Sagittarius.S01

List315.Name: Sagan Kinetics Shield-II
List315.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of kinetic-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>150</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>35</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>120</font> additional points of kinetic damage.
List315.Comment2: Requires Sagan Kinetics Shield-I to be researched.

List316.Name: Sagan Kinetics Shield-III
List316.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of kinetic-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>220</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>45</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>155</font> additional points of kinetic damage.
List316.Comment2: Requires Sagan Kinetics Shield-II to be researched.

List317.Name: Sagan Heat Shield-I
List317.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of heat-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>70</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>30</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>80</font> additional points of heat damage.
List317.Comment2:
Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Heat Diffusion Shield-III)
How to obtain: Constellation Instance-Sagittarius.S02

List318.Comment2: Requires Sagan Heat Shield-I to be researched.

List319.Name: Sagan Heat Shield-III
List319.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of heat-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>210</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>50</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>150</font> additional points of heat damage.

Please learn the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. (Precondition: Space-Time Magnetic Shield-III)

List321.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of magnetic-damage based weapons. List321.Comment2: Requires Sagan Magnetic Shield-I to be researched.

List322.Name: Sagan Magnetic Shield-III
List322.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of magnetic-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>225</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>45</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>160</font> additional points of magnetic damage.
List322.Comment2: Requires Sagan Magnetic Shield-II to be researched.

List323.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of explosive-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>100</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>30</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>75</font> additional points of explosive damage.
List323.Comment2:

How to obtain: Constellation Instance-Sagittarius.S04

List324.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of explosive-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>170</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>40</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>100</font> additional points of explosive damage.
List324.Comment2: Requires Sagan Anti-Explosive Shield-I to be researched.

List325.Name: Sagan Anti-Explosive Shield-III
List325.Comment: A Sagan-Class energy shield module specially designed to absorb the attack of explosive-damage based weapons. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>240</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>50</font> points of damage, as well as negating <font color='#00FF00'>145</font> additional points of explosive damage.
List325.Comment2: Requires Sagan Anti-Explosive Shield-II to be researched.

List326.Name: Armstrong Core-I
List326.Comment: An energy core designed using warp drive technology. Increases Agility by:<font color='#00FF00'>+1</font>. Damage Negation on all other shield modules installed is increased by <font color='#00FF00'>5</font>.(Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time)
List326.Comment2: Please research the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. Precondition: Time Dilation Module-III

List327.Name: Armstrong Core-II
List327.Comment: An energy core designed using warp drive technology. Increases Agility by:<font color='#00FF00'>+1.5</font>. Damage Negation on all other shield modules installed is increased by <font color='#00FF00'>9</font>.(Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time)
List327.Comment2: Requires Armstrong Core-I to be researched.

List328.Name: Armstrong Core-III
List328.Comment: An energy core designed using warp drive technology. Increases Agility by:<font color='#00FF00'>+2</font>. Damage Negation on all other shield modules installed is increased by <font color='#00FF00'>13</font>.(Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time)
List328.Comment2: Requires Armstrong Core-II to be researched.

List329.Name: Gladius Arc-I
List329.Comment: Designed with the latest Alliance technology, the Gladius Arc greatly increases the firing rate for its titanium alloy projectiles. Perfect for firing upon unshielded targets but at a higher chance to overheat.
List329.Comment2:
Research the Bloodspur-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Gladius Arc Chests.

List330.Name: Gladius Arc-II
List330.Comment: Designed with the latest Alliance technology, the Gladius Arc greatly increases the firing rate for its titanium alloy projectiles. Perfect for firing upon unshielded targets but at a higher chance to overheat.

List331.Name: Gladius Arc-III
List331.Comment: Designed with the latest Alliance technology, the Gladius Arc greatly increases the firing rate for its titanium alloy projectiles. Perfect for firing upon unshielded targets but at a higher chance to overheat.

List332.Name: Black Widow-I
List332.Comment: This weapon's projectiles are made from a rare metal mined from a hidden planet. Upon impact, this element causes secondary explosions to occur.
List332.Comment2:
Research the Shooting Star-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Black Widow Chests.

List333.Name: Black Widow-II
List333.Comment: This weapon's projectiles are made from a rare metal mined from a hidden planet. Upon impact, this element causes secondary explosions to occur.

List334.Name: Black Widow-III
List334.Comment: This weapon's projectiles are made from a rare metal mined from a hidden planet. Upon impact, this element causes secondary explosions to occur.

List335.Name: Tracking Bolt-I
List335.Comment: Guided by the lastest tracking systems, the Tracking Bolt's accuracy was successful in 99.8% of tests performed.
List335.Comment2:
Research the Phantom Ray-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Tracking Bolt Chests.

List336.Name: Tracking Bolt-II
List336.Comment: Guided by the lastest tracking systems, the Tracking Bolt's accuracy was successful in 99.8% of tests performed.

List337.Name: Tracking Bolt-III
List337.Comment: Guided by the lastest tracking systems, the Tracking Bolt's accuracy was successful in 99.8% of tests performed.

List338.Name: Warp Beam-I
List338.Comment: By distorting time and space, the energy beam fired from this cannon is untrackable by radar, only making its presence known upon impact.
List338.Comment2:
Research the Scorpion Stonger-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Warp Beam Chests.

List339.Name: Warp Beam-II
List339.Comment: By distorting time and space, the energy beam fired from this cannon is untrackable by radar, only making its presence known upon impact.

List340.Name: Warp Beam-III
List340.Comment: By distorting time and space, the energy beam fired from this cannon is untrackable by radar, only making its presence known upon impact.

List341.Name: Apate-I
List341.Comment: Upon impact, this cluster missile spilts into smaller projectiles that cause additional explosions. The energy created by these explosions ignite any nearby shrapnel.
List341.Comment2:
Research the Shadowflare-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Apate Chests.

List342.Name: Apate-II
List342.Comment: Upon impact, this cluster missile spilts into smaller projectiles that cause additional explosions. The energy created by these explosions ignite any nearby shrapnel.

List343.Name: Apate-III
List343.Comment: Upon impact, this cluster missile spilts into smaller projectiles that cause additional explosions. The energy created by these explosions ignite any nearby shrapnel.

List344.Name: Spitfire-I
List344.Comment: Developed by the team behind the Warp Beam, the tip of the Spitfire contains an anti-matter warhead. Upon impact, a temporary blackhole opens at the source unleashing several explosions.
List344.Comment2:
Research the Red Comet-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Spitfire Chests.

List345.Name: Spitfire-II
List345.Comment: Developed by the team behind the Warp Beam, the tip of the Spitfire contains an anti-matter warhead. Upon impact, a temporary blackhole opens at the source unleashing several explosions.

List346.Name: Spitfire-III
List346.Comment: Developed by the team behind the Warp Beam, the tip of the Spitfire contains an anti-matter warhead. Upon impact, a temporary blackhole opens at the source unleashing several explosions.

List347.Name: Dusk Interceptor-I
List347.Comment: With a hull nearly invisible to most radars, it's oftemn used on covert, nuclear strikes.
List347.Comment2:
Research the Dark Specter-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Dusk Interceptor Chests.

List348.Name: Dusk Interceptor-II
List348.Comment: With a hull nearly invisible to most radars, it's oftemn used on covert, nuclear strikes.

List349.Name: Dusk Interceptor-III
List349.Comment: With a hull nearly invisible to most radars, it's oftemn used on covert, nuclear strikes.

List350.Name: Fox Tail-I
List350.Comment: With a hull maintained by nano bots, the Fox Tail can easily adapt to any combat scenario. It also employs a titanium alloy armor and somposite beam weaponry.
List350.Comment2:
Research the Chronus Wing-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in the Champions' Mall or Fox Tail Chests.

List351.Name: Fox Tail-II
List351.Comment: With a hull maintained by nano bots, the Fox Tail can easily adapt to any combat scenario. It also employs a titanium alloy armor and somposite beam weaponry.

List352.Name: Fox Tail-III
List352.Comment: With a hull maintained by nano bots, the Fox Tail can easily adapt to any combat scenario. It also employs a titanium alloy armor and somposite beam weaponry.

List353.Name: Armstrong Radion Armor-I
List353.Comment: This energy-based armor module uses radion particles to disperse the most powerful attacks. It negates <font color='#00FF00'>40</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>15%</font> and overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.1</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.
List353.Comment2:
Research the Daedelus Control System-III to unlock this item.
Found in Armstrong Radion Armor Chests.

List354.Name: Armstrong Radion Armor-II
List354.Comment: This energy-based armor module uses radion particles to disperse the most powerful attacks. It negates <font color='#00FF00'>60</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>20%</font> and overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.3</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.

List355.Name: Armstrong Radion Armor-III
List355.Comment: This energy-based armor module uses radion particles to disperse the most powerful attacks. It negates <font color='#00FF00'>90</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>25%</font> and overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.5</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.

List356.Name: Aldrin Particle Cannon-I
List356.Comment: This cannon scatters particles, damaging and disabling incoming high-speed objects like missiles and Ship-based weapons. Increases interception rate by <font color='#00FF00'>45%</font> and overall ship defense by <font color='#00FF00'>+0.1</font>.
List356.Comment2:
Research the Extreme Counterattack-III Blueprint to unlock this item.
Found in Aldrin Particle Cannon Chests.

List357.Name: Aldrin Particle Cannon-II
List357.Comment: This cannon scatters particles, damaging and disabling incoming high-speed objects like missiles and Ship-based weapons. Increases interception rate by <font color='#00FF00'>55%</font> and overall ship defense by <font color='#00FF00'>+0.2</font>.

List358.Name: Aldrin Particle Cannon-III
List358.Comment: This cannon scatters particles, damaging and disabling incoming high-speed objects like missiles and Ship-based weapons. Increases interception rate by <font color='#00FF00'>65%</font> and overall ship defense by <font color='#00FF00'>+0.3</font>.

List359.Name: Copernicus Gyroscope-I
List359.Comment: An upgrade of the Gravity Maint. Facility, the Copernicus Gyroscope gives the pilot even greater control over the spacecraft. At this level, increases Structure by <font color='#00FF00'>1,200</font>, Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>1</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>50%</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List359.Comment2:
Requires a Copernicus Gyroscope blueprint and "Daedalus Control System-III" research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions Mall.

List360.Name: Copernicus Gyroscope-II
List360.Comment: An upgrade of the Gravity Maint. Facility, the Copernicus Gyroscope gives the pilot even greater control over the spacecraft. At this level, increases Structure by <font color='#00FF00'>2,000</font>, Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>1.5</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>80%</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List360.Comment2: Requires Copernicus Gyroscope-I research to unlock.

List361.Name: Copernicus Gyroscope-III
List361.Comment: An upgrade of the Gravity Maint. Facility, the Copernicus Gyroscope gives the pilot even greater control over the spacecraft. At this level, increases Structure by <font color='#00FF00'>3,000</font>, Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>2</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>120%</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List361.Comment2: Requires Copernicus Gyroscope-II research to unlock.

List362.Name: "Icarus" Control System-I
List362.Comment: A breakthrough innovation of the Federation's M.R. Division, the "Icarus" Control System not only improved on the impact diffusion and energy deflection of the "Daedalus", but can also seamlessly pair with the latter. Activates if shields are ineffective. At this level, increases damage negation by <font color='#00FF00'>3%</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>50%</font>, and Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.5</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List362.Comment2:
Requires an "Icarus" Control System blueprint and "Daedalus Control System-III" research to unlock.
Found in an "Icarus" Chest.

List363.Name: "Icarus" Control System-II
List363.Comment: A breakthrough innovation of the Federation's M.R. Division, the "Icarus" Control System not only improved on the impact diffusion and energy deflection of the "Daedalus", but can also seamlessly pair with the latter. Activates if shields are ineffective. At this level, increases damage negation by <font color='#00FF00'>4%</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>100%</font>, and Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>1</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List363.Comment2: Requires "Icarus" Control System-I research to unlock.

List364.Name: "Icarus" Control System-III
List364.Comment: A breakthrough innovation of the Federation's M.R. Division, the "Icarus" Control System not only improved on the impact diffusion and energy deflection of the "Daedalus", but can also seamlessly pair with the latter. Activates if shields are ineffective. At this level, increases damage negation by <font color='#00FF00'>5%</font>, Stability by <font color='#00FF00'>150%</font>, and Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>1.5</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List364.Comment2: Requires "Icarus" Control System-II research to unlock.

List365.Name: Drexler Ratchet-I
List365.Comment: Refined from the original Hull Maintenance Mechanic technology. Nanobots repair up to <font color='#00FF00'>90</font> Structure Points to damaged ships each Round. At this level, also increases Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.1</font>.
List365.Comment2:
Requires a Drexler Ratchet blueprint and "Daedalus Control System-III" research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall.

List366.Name: Drexler Ratchet-II
List366.Comment: Refined from the original Hull Maintenance Mechanic technology. Nanobots repair up to <font color='#00FF00'>180</font> Structure Points to damaged ships each Round. At this level, also increases Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.2</font>.
List366.Comment2: Requires Drexler Ratchet-I research to unlock.

List367.Name: Drexler Ratchet-III
List367.Comment: Refined from the original Hull Maintenance Mechanic technology. Nanobots repair up to <font color='#00FF00'>270</font> Structure Points to damaged ships each Round. At this level, also increases Overall Ship Defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.3</font>.
List367.Comment2: Requires Drexler Ratchet-II research to unlock.

List368.Name: Hertz Regenerator-I
List368.Comment: Refined from the original Shield Regenerator technology. Restores <font color='#00FF00'>90</font> Shield Points per Round.
List368.Comment2:
Requires a Hertz Regenerator blueprint and "Eos Phase Shift Shield" research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall.

List369.Name: Hertz Regenerator-II
List369.Comment: Refined from the original Shield Regenerator technology. Restores <font color='#00FF00'>180</font> Shield Points per Round.
List369.Comment2: Requires Hertz Regenerator-I research to unlock.

List370.Name: Hertz Regenerator-III
List370.Comment: Refined from the original Shield Regenerator technology. Restores <font color='#00FF00'>270</font> Shield Points per Round.
List370.Comment2: Requires Hertz Regenerator-II research to unlock.

List371.Name: Drexler Nano Cells
List371.Comment: An advanced fuel and power storage unit using improved nanotechnology. Increases Storage by: <font color='#00FF00'>500</font>. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List371.Comment2:
Requires a Drexler Nano Cells blueprint and Nano Station Warehouse research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall.

List372.Name: Mercurius-I
List372.Comment: Named for the guidance technology deployed in this weapon, the Mercurius fires a quick succession of 3 shells per volley, causing a chain reaction that decimates armor and energy shields alike.
List372.Comment2:
Requires a Mercurius blueprint and Gladius Arc-III and Black Widow-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Mercurius Chests.

List373.Name: Mercurius-II
List373.Comment: Named for the guidance technology deployed in this weapon, the Mercurius fires a quick succession of 3 shells per volley, causing a chain reaction that decimates armor and energy shields alike.

List374.Name: Mercurius-III
List374.Comment: Named for the guidance technology deployed in this weapon, the Mercurius fires a quick succession of 3 shells per volley, causing a chain reaction that decimates armor and energy shields alike.

List375.Name: Debellatio-I
List375.Comment: A rotary-motion-based ballistics weapon that scatters 27 shells per volley. This weapon uses the intense pressure caused by the unique projection of shells to deliver more damage. While deadly, it's less cost-efficient than its counterparts due to the amount of He3 required.
List375.Comment2:
Requires a Debellatio blueprint and Gladius Arc-III and Black Widow-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Debellatio Chests.

List376.Name: Debellatio-II
List376.Comment: A rotary-motion-based ballistics weapon that scatters 27 shells per volley. This weapon uses the intense pressure caused by the unique projection of shells to deliver more damage. While deadly, it's less cost-efficient than its counterparts due to the amount of He3 required.

List377.Name: Debellatio-III
List377.Comment: A rotary-motion-based ballistics weapon that scatters 27 shells per volley. This weapon uses the intense pressure caused by the unique projection of shells to deliver more damage. While deadly, it's less cost-efficient than its counterparts due to the amount of He3 required.

List378.Name: Force Majoris-I
List378.Comment: Using miniature particle accelerators to generate anti-matter particles, the Force Majoris uses magnetism to suspend and fire these particles, causing a massive release of energy.
List378.Comment2:
Requires a Force Majoris blueprint and Tracking Bolt-III and Warp Beam-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Force Majoris Chests.

List379.Name: Force Majoris-II
List379.Comment: Using miniature particle accelerators to generate anti-matter particles, the Force Majoris uses magnetism to suspend and fire these particles, causing a massive release of energy.
List379.Comment2: Requires Force Majoris-I research to unlock.

List380.Name: Force Majoris-III
List380.Comment: Using miniature particle accelerators to generate anti-matter particles, the Force Majoris uses magnetism to suspend and fire these particles, causing a massive release of energy.
List380.Comment2: Requires Force Majoris-II research to unlock.

List381.Name: Frostbite-I
List381.Comment: The Frostbite uses particle beams to dissipate heat from objects that it hits, quickly reducing surface temperatures to near absolute zero and follows up with an energy pulse that shatters the target into smithereens.
List381.Comment2:
Requires a Frostbite blueprint and Tracking Bolt-III and Warp Beam-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Frostbite Chests.

List382.Name: Frostbite-II
List382.Comment: The Frostbite uses particle beams to dissipate heat from objects that it hits, quickly reducing surface temperatures to near absolute zero and follows up with an energy pulse that shatters the target into smithereens.

List383.Name: Frostbite-III
List383.Comment: The Frostbite uses particle beams to dissipate heat from objects that it hits, quickly reducing surface temperatures to near absolute zero and follows up with an energy pulse that shatters the target into smithereens.

List384.Name: Landeel-I
List384.Comment: Named after the technology used for search-and-rescue missions, the intelligent scanners built into these missiles scan instead for points where shields are at their thinnest and proceeds to deliver its payload of nuclear cluster bombs.
List384.Comment2:
Requires a Landeel blueprint and Apate-III and Spitfire-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Landeel Chests.

List385.Name: Landeel-II
List385.Comment: Named after the technology used for search-and-rescue missions, the intelligent scanners built into these missiles scan instead for points where shields are at their thinnest and proceeds to deliver its payload of nuclear cluster bombs.

List386.Name: Landeel-III
List386.Comment: Named after the technology used for search-and-rescue missions, the intelligent scanners built into these missiles scan instead for points where shields are at their thinnest and proceeds to deliver its payload of nuclear cluster bombs.

List387.Name: Thermite Nest-I
List387.Comment: Each missile carries a payload of nanobots made of Thermite that coordinate their movements with each other and spontaenously self-combust, eating into the ship's structure.
List387.Comment2:
Requires a Thermite Nest blueprint and Apate-III and Spitfire-III reseach to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Thermite Nest Chests.

List388.Name: Thermite Nest-II
List388.Comment: Each missile carries a payload of nanobots made of Thermite that coordinate their movements with each other and spontaenously self-combust, eating into the ship's structure.
List388.Comment2: Requires Thermite Nest-I research to unlock.

List389.Name: Thermite Nest-III
List389.Comment: Each missile carries a payload of nanobots made of Thermite that coordinate their movements with each other and spontaenously self-combust, eating into the ship's structure.
List389.Comment2: Requires Thermite Nest-II research to unlock.

List390.Name: Spectre-I
List390.Comment: The Spectre pushes the limits of engineering, increasing engine capacity of droid shuttles to their sub-warp limits. They perform single fly-by massive attacks at this speed to evade interception, before returning to their host and launching their next wave.
List390.Comment2:
Requires a Spectre blueprint and Dusk Interceptor-III and Foxtail-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in Spectre Chests.

List391.Name: Spectre-II
List391.Comment: The Spectre pushes the limits of engineering, increasing engine capacity of droid shuttles to their sub-warp limits. They perform single fly-by massive attacks at this speed to evade interception, before returning to their host and launching their next wave.

List392.Name: Spectre-III
List392.Comment: The Spectre pushes the limits of engineering, increasing engine capacity of droid shuttles to their sub-warp limits. They perform single fly-by massive attacks at this speed to evade interception, before returning to their host and launching their next wave.

List393.Name: MIND Custom-I
List393.Comment: The quantum computing employed in this weapon is such a breakthrough that this ship-based weapon is named after the computer that controls it. Able to compute instructions at supersonic speeds, the MIND Custom is one of the deadliest weapons in the galaxy.
List393.Comment2:
Requires a MIND Custom blueprint and Dusk Interceptor-III and Foxtail-III research to unlock.
Can be bought in the Champions' Mall or found in MIND Custom Chests.

List394.Name: MIND Custom-II
List394.Comment: The quantum computing employed in this weapon is such a breakthrough that this ship-based weapon is named after the computer that controls it. Able to compute instructions at supersonic speeds, the MIND Custom is one of the deadliest weapons in the galaxy.
List394.Comment2: Requires MIND Custom-I research to unlock.

List395.Name: MIND Custom-III
List395.Comment: The quantum computing employed in this weapon is such a breakthrough that this ship-based weapon is named after the computer that controls it. Able to compute instructions at supersonic speeds, the MIND Custom is one of the deadliest weapons in the galaxy.
List395.Comment2: Requires MIND Custom-II research to unlock.

List396.Name: Jack-O-Lantern I
List396.Comment: Replica of the lucky charm worn by legendary space pirate Zech Rosier. Increases Shields by <font color='#00FF00'>130</font> and negates <font color='#00FF00'>90</font> damage taken.
List396.Comment2: Requires a Jack-O-Lantern Blueprint and EOS Phase Shift Shield-III research to unlock.

List397.Name: Jack-O-Lantern II
List397.Comment: Replica of the lucky charm worn by legendary space pirate Zech Rosier. Increases Shields by <font color='#00FF00'>180</font> and negates <font color='#00FF00'>110</font> damage taken.

List398.Name: Jack-O-Lantern III
List398.Comment: Replica of the lucky charm worn by legendary space pirate Zech Rosier. Increases Shields by <font color='#00FF00'>260</font> and negates <font color='#00FF00'>140</font> damage taken.

List399.Name: Artemis-I
List399.Comment: A breakthrough in weapon-guidance systems, the Artemis is not only capable of achieving a lock-on in the harshest environments but it also increases the lethality of its payload as well. When equipped, the Artemis-I increases your fleet's Critical Strike Rate by <font color='#00FF00'>5%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>0.5</font>, and Stability by<font color='#00FF00'>60%</font>. As Steering increases the damage of weapons, each ship is limited to only 1 Artemis module.
List399.Comment2: Research the corresponding Blueprint to unlock this item. Precondition: Time Dilation Module-III

List400.Name: Artemis-II
List400.Comment: A breakthrough in weapon-guidance systems, the Artemis is not only capable of achieving a lock-on in the harshest environments but it also increases the lethality of its payload as well. When equipped, the Artemis-II increases your fleet's Critical Strike Rate by <font color='#00FF00'>10%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>1</font>, and Stability by<font color='#00FF00'>80%</font>. As Steering increases the damage of weapons, each ship is limited to only 1 Artemis module.
List400.Comment2: Requires Artemis-I to be researched first.

List401.Name: Artemis-III
List401.Comment: A breakthrough in weapon-guidance systems, the Artemis is not only capable of achieving a lock-on in the harshest environments but it also increases the lethality of its payload as well. When equipped, the Artemis-III increases your fleet's Critical Strike Rate by <font color='#00FF00'>15%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>1.5</font>, and Stability by<font color='#00FF00'>120%</font>. As Steering increases the damage of weapons, each ship is limited to only 1 Artemis module.
List401.Comment2: Requires Artemis-II to be researched first.

List402.Name: Ancient Artillery-I
List402.Comment: A chaingun based on a historical design, the Ancient Artillery uses the latest EOT targeting system to ensure the most precise control.
List402.Comment2:
Requires an Ancient Artillery Blueprint and Mercurius-III and Debellatio-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Ancient Artillery (Chest)

List403.Name: Ancient Artillery-II
List403.Comment: A chaingun based on a historical design, the Ancient Artillery uses the latest EOT targeting system to ensure the most precise control.

List404.Name: Ancient Artillery-III
List404.Comment: A chaingun based on a historical design, the Ancient Artillery uses the latest EOT targeting system to ensure the most precise control.

List405.Name: Ionstormer-I
List405.Comment: Using DOM technology, the Ionstormer fires shells that unleash electromagnetic flares upon impact, causing continuous damage to the ship structure.
List405.Comment2:
Requires an Ionstormer Blueprint and Mercurius-III and Debellatio-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Ionstormer (Chest)

List406.Name: Ionstormer-II
List406.Comment: Using DOM technology, the Ionstormer fires shells that unleash electromagnetic flares upon impact, causing continuous damage to the ship structure.

List407.Name: Ionstormer-III
List407.Comment: Using DOM technology, the Ionstormer fires shells that unleash electromagnetic flares upon impact, causing continuous damage to the ship structure.

List408.Name: Ashbringer-I
List408.Comment: The Ashbringer harnesses dark energy to manipulate light into beams of great physical impact, capable to shattering even the most solid ships in the galaxy.
List408.Comment2:
Requires an Ashbringer Blueprint and Force Majoris-III and Frostbite-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Ashbringer (Chest)

List409.Name: Ashbringer-II
List409.Comment: The Ashbringer harnesses dark energy to manipulate light into beams of great physical impact, capable to shattering even the most solid ships in the galaxy.

List410.Name: Ashbringer-III
List410.Comment: The Ashbringer harnesses dark energy to manipulate light into beams of great physical impact, capable to shattering even the most solid ships in the galaxy.

List411.Name: Arctic Crescent-I
List411.Comment: A superior version of the Frostbite that quickly channels heat away from materials that come into contact with its beam. Extremely effective in de-energizing shields and causing ship hulls to turn brittle.
List411.Comment2:
Requires an Arctic Crescent Blueprint and Force Majoris-III and Frostbite-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Arctic Crescent (Chest)

List412.Name: Arctic Crescent-II
List412.Comment: A superior version of the Frostbite that quickly channels heat away from materials that come into contact with its beam. Extremely effective in de-energizing shields and causing ship hulls to turn brittle.

List413.Name: Arctic Crescent-III
List413.Comment: A superior version of the Frostbite that quickly channels heat away from materials that come into contact with its beam. Extremely effective in de-energizing shields and causing ship hulls to turn brittle.

List414.Name: Boson Condensator-I
List414.Comment: This warhead unleashes a negative pressure that creates a vacuum known as a quantum Higgs condensate, violently absorbing any trace of heat and energy within the event horizon, obliterating life and machinery alike.
List414.Comment2:
Requires a Boson Condensator Blueprint and Landeel-III and Thermite Nest-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open a Boson Condensator (Chest)

List415.Name: Boson Condensator-II
List415.Comment: This warhead unleashes a negative pressure that creates a vacuum known as a quantum Higgs condensate, violently absorbing any trace of heat and energy within the event horizon, obliterating life and machinery alike.

List416.Name: Boson Condensator-III
List416.Comment: This warhead unleashes a negative pressure that creates a vacuum known as a quantum Higgs condensate, violently absorbing any trace of heat and energy within the event horizon, obliterating life and machinery alike.

List417.Name: Nano Trojans-I
List417.Comment: As the name describes, this missle packs a payload of powerful nanobots that seek and destroy all machinery en masse. A single missile can decimate an entire fleet in a tight formation.
List417.Comment2:
Requires a Nano Trojans Blueprint and Landeel-III and Thermite Nest-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open a Nano Trojans (Chest)

List418.Name: Nano Trojans-II
List418.Comment: As the name describes, this missle packs a payload of powerful nanobots that seek and destroy all machinery en masse. A single missile can decimate an entire fleet in a tight formation.

List419.Name: Nano Trojans-III
List419.Comment: As the name describes, this missle packs a payload of powerful nanobots that seek and destroy all machinery en masse. A single missile can decimate an entire fleet in a tight formation.

List420.Name: Hellhorn-I
List420.Comment: Utilizing the physics of sonic booms, harvester shuttles replicate this effect with dark matter in space, compressing them and unleashing high power impact booms onto the enemy.
List420.Comment2:
Requires a Hellhorn Blueprint and Spectre-III and MIND-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Hellhorn (Chest)

List421.Name: Hellhorn-II
List421.Comment: Utilizing the physics of sonic booms, harvester shuttles replicate this effect with dark matter in space, compressing them and unleashing high power impact booms onto the enemy.

List422.Name: Hellhorn-III
List422.Comment: Utilizing the physics of sonic booms, harvester shuttles replicate this effect with dark matter in space, compressing them and unleashing high power impact booms onto the enemy.

List423.Name: Stormsingers-I
List423.Comment: Stormsingers are complex, extremely powerful flying computers in the form of shuttles. They broadcast signals that are intercepted by enemy radar that in turn, hijack their systems and cause enemy ships to reverse ship gravity controls and life support systems, effectively smothering ship and crew from the inside.
List423.Comment2:
Requires a Stormsingers Blueprint and Spectre-III and MIND-III research to unlock.
How to obtain: Buy from Champions' Mall or open an Stormsingers (Chest)

List424.Name: Stormsingers-II
List424.Comment: Stormsingers are complex, extremely powerful flying computers in the form of shuttles. They broadcast signals that are intercepted by enemy radar that in turn, hijack their systems and cause enemy ships to reverse ship gravity controls and life support systems, effectively smothering ship and crew from the inside.

List425.Name: Stormsingers-III
List425.Comment: Stormsingers are complex, extremely powerful flying computers in the form of shuttles. They broadcast signals that are intercepted by enemy radar that in turn, hijack their systems and cause enemy ships to reverse ship gravity controls and life support systems, effectively smothering ship and crew from the inside.

List426.Name: Wheeler Engine
List426.Comment: This powerful engine doesn't move the ship but rather generates a temporary Einstein-Rosen bridge, allowing the ship to travel great distances faster than the speed of light. Movement: <font color='#00FF00'>+3</font>,Steering: <font color='#00FF00'>+1</font>,Agility: <font color='#00FF00'>+1</font>. Steering increases weapon damage output. Agility reduces damage taken from enemy attacks. Only 1 Wheeler Engine can be installed on a ship.
List426.Comment2: Requires a Wheeler Engine Blueprint and EOS Phase Shift Engine-III to unlock. Bought in the Champions' Mall.

List427.Name: Infrared Seeker I
List427.Comment: Uses thermal-infrared imaging to greatly improve ship accuracy and lethality. Increases weapon hit rate by <font color='#00FF00'>5%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>0.3</font>, and Agility by <font color='#00FF00'>0.6</font>. Steering power increases attack damage. Only 1 equipment piece of this type may be used at a time.
List427.Comment2: Requires Infrared Seeker I blueprint and Auto Target System III research to unlock.

List428.Name: Infrared Seeker II
List428.Comment: Uses thermal-infrared imaging to greatly improve ship accuracy and lethality. Increases weapon hit rate by <font color='#00FF00'>10%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>0.6</font>, and Agility by <font color='#00FF00'>1.2</font>. Steering power increases attack damage. Only 1 equipment piece of this type may be used at a time.

List429.Name: Infrared Seeker III
List429.Comment: Uses thermal-infrared imaging to greatly improve ship accuracy and lethality. Increases weapon hit rate by <font color='#00FF00'>15%</font>, Steering by <font color='#00FF00'>1</font>, and Agility by <font color='#00FF00'>2</font>. Steering power increases attack damage. Only 1 equipment piece of this type may be used at a time.

List430.Name: Tensor Armor I
List430.Comment: Activated by losing shields, Tensor Armor serves as your last line of defense. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>74</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>20%</font>, and increases overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.2</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.
List430.Comment2: Requires Tensor Armor I blueprint and Armstrong Radion Armor III research to unlock.

List431.Name: Tensor Armor II
List431.Comment: Activated by losing shields, Tensor Armor serves as your last line of defense. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>111</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>25%</font>, and increases overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.4</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.

List432.Name: Tensor Armor III
List432.Comment: Activated by losing shields, Tensor Armor serves as your last line of defense. Negates <font color='#00FF00'>170</font> damage, increases stability by <font color='#00FF00'>30%</font>, and increases overall defense by <font color='#00FF00'>0.7</font>. Activates when shields are ineffective.

List433.Name: Helio Sword I
List433.Comment: The Helio Sword is a 120mm caliber rapid-fire ballistic weapon designed to cause maximum damage to ship structures. These shells also use thermal energy released by the ship's generators offensively.
List433.Comment2: Requires a Helio Sword Blueprint and Ancient Artillery III research to unlock.

List434.Name: Helio Sword II
List434.Comment: The Helio Sword is a 120mm caliber rapid-fire ballistic weapon designed to cause maximum damage to ship structures. These shells also use thermal energy released by the ship's generators offensively.
List434.Comment2: Requires Helio Sword I research to unlock.

List435.Name: Helio Sword III
List435.Comment: The Helio Sword is a 120mm caliber rapid-fire ballistic weapon designed to cause maximum damage to ship structures. These shells also use thermal energy released by the ship's generators offensively.
List435.Comment2: Requires Helio Sword II research to unlock.

List436.Name: Dire Brand I
List436.Comment: Built for rapid deployment and close-quarter combat, Dire Brand shells send shock pulses throughout enemy ship hulls, causing catastrophic compromise to structural integrity.
List436.Comment2: Requires a Dire Brand Blueprint and Ionstormer III research to unlock.

List437.Name: Dire Brand II
List437.Comment: Built for rapid deployment and close-quarter combat, Dire Brand shells send shock pulses throughout enemy ship hulls, causing catastrophic compromise to structural integrity.
List437.Comment2: Requires Dire Brand I research to unlock.

List438.Name: Dire Brand III
List438.Comment: Built for rapid deployment and close-quarter combat, Dire Brand shells send shock pulses throughout enemy ship hulls, causing catastrophic compromise to structural integrity.
List438.Comment2: Requires Dire Brand II research to unlock.

List439.Name: Odd Eye I
List439.Comment: Named after the Cyclops of The Iliad, Odd Eye projects antiparticles over long distances in a stable stream before annihilating itself and the intended target in an extremely powerful release of energy.
List439.Comment2: Requires an Odd Eye Blueprint and Ashbringer III research to unlock.

List440.Name: Odd Eye II
List440.Comment: Named after the Cyclops of The Iliad, Odd Eye projects antiparticles over long distances in a stable stream before annihilating itself and the intended target in an extremely powerful release of energy.
List440.Comment2: Requires Odd Eye I research to unlock.

List441.Name: Odd Eye III
List441.Comment: Named after the Cyclops of The Iliad, Odd Eye projects antiparticles over long distances in a stable stream before annihilating itself and the intended target in an extremely powerful release of energy.
List441.Comment2: Requires Odd Eye II research to unlock.

List442.Name: Dark Horizon I
List442.Comment: Building on the technology of the Frostbite and Arctic Crescent, the Dark Horizon uses a projection of harnessed dark matter to more accurately sap the target of all heat energy.
List442.Comment2: Requires a Dark Horizon Blueprint and Arctic Crescent III research to unlock.

List443.Name: Dark Horizon II
List443.Comment: Building on the technology of the Frostbite and Arctic Crescent, the Dark Horizon uses a projection of harnessed dark matter to more accurately sap the target of all heat energy.
List443.Comment2: Requires Dark Horizon I research to unlock.

List444.Name: Dark Horizon III
List444.Comment: Building on the technology of the Frostbite and Arctic Crescent, the Dark Horizon uses a projection of harnessed dark matter to more accurately sap the target of all heat energy.
List444.Comment2: Requires Dark Horizon II research to unlock.

List445.Name: Zero Event I
List445.Comment: Zero Event rockets deliver a payload of the same harnessed dark matter as the Dark Horizon but is designed to blanket a wide area instead of a focus spot.
List445.Comment2: Requires a Zero Event Blueprint and Boson Condensator III research to unlock.

List446.Name: Zero Event II
List446.Comment: Zero Event rockets deliver a payload of the same harnessed dark matter as the Dark Horizon but is designed to blanket a wide area instead of a focus spot.
List446.Comment2: Requires Zero Event I research to unlock.

List447.Name: Zero Event III
List447.Comment: Zero Event rockets deliver a payload of the same harnessed dark matter as the Dark Horizon but is designed to blanket a wide area instead of a focus spot.
List447.Comment2: Requires Zero Event II research to unlock.

List448.Name: Zeus Ex Machina I
List448.Comment: A volley of these rockets puts an unexpected stop to any fleet. Packed with guided smart bombs that can travel a limited distance, they attach to any passing machinery, detonating and releasing an EMP burst.
List448.Comment2: Requires a Zeus Ex Machina Blueprint and Nano Trojans III research to unlock.

List449.Name: Zeus Ex Machina II
List449.Comment: A volley of these rockets puts an unexpected stop to any fleet. Packed with guided smart bombs that can travel a limited distance, they attach to any passing machinery, detonating and releasing an EMP burst.
List449.Comment2: Requires Zeus Ex Machina I research to unlock.

List450.Name: Zeus Ex Machina III
List450.Comment: A volley of these rockets puts an unexpected stop to any fleet. Packed with guided smart bombs that can travel a limited distance, they attach to any passing machinery, detonating and releasing an EMP burst.
List450.Comment2: Requires Zeus Ex Machina II research to unlock.

List451.Name: Blockbuster I
List451.Comment: The Blockbuster proves that size still matters. The most massive of all shuttle-based weapons to date, a Blockbuster raid can decimate any Generation-III defense in minutes.
List451.Comment2: Requires a Blockbuster Blueprint and Hellhorn III research to unlock.

List452.Name: Blockbuster II
List452.Comment: The Blockbuster proves that size still matters. The most massive of all shuttle-based weapons to date, a Blockbuster raid can decimate any Generation-III defense in minutes.

List453.Name: Blockbuster III

List454.Name: Tyrannos I
List454.Comment: The Tyrannos sends shuttles to surround the enemy and generates a massive gravity field within the formation, crushing the entire enemy fleets.
List454.Comment2: Requires a Tyrannos Blueprint and Stormsingers III research to unlock.

List455.Name: Tyrannos II
List455.Comment: The Tyrannos sends shuttles to surround the enemy and generates a massive gravity field within the formation, crushing the entire enemy fleets.

List457.Name: Tyson Kinetic Shield I
List457.Comment: An improved version of the Sagan-Class shield, Tyson shields absorb even more kinetic damage. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>90</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>25</font> points of damage as well as <font color='#00FF00'>110</font> additional points of kinetic damage.

Requires a Tyson Kinetic Shield Blueprint and Jack-O-Lantern III research to unlock.
Found in the Taurus.T01 Constellation Instance.

List465.Comment: An improved version of the Sagan-Class shield, Tyson shields absorb even more magnetic damage. List466.Comment2:
Requires a Tyson Anti-Explosion Shield Blueprint and Jack-O-Lantern III research to unlock.

List467.Comment: An improved version of the Sagan-Class shield, Tyson shields absorb even more explosive damage. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>150</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>40</font> points of damage as well as <font color='#00FF00'>145</font> additional points of explosive damage.

List468.Comment: An improved version of the Sagan-Class shield, Tyson shields absorb even more explosive damage. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>275</font> points to your shield and negates <font color='#00FF00'>70</font> points of damage as well as <font color='#00FF00'>185</font> additional points of explosive damage.

List469.Name: Vapor Engine
List469.Comment: Legendary engine developed by Vlad the Inhaler. Movement:<font color='#00FF00'> +5</font> Steering:<font color='#00FF00'> +1.5</font> Agility:<font color='#00FF00'> +1.5</font>. Steering power increases DMG. Only 1 piece of equipment of this type may be equipped at a time.
List469.Comment2: Requires Wheeler Engine research to unlock.

List470.Name: Twilight Armor I
List470.Comment: Made of dark matter, this shield can easily deflect any weaponry. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>165</font> points to shields and absorbs <font color='#00FF00'>155</font> damage at its current level.
List470.Comment2: Research the Jack-O-Lantern III Blueprint to unlock this item.

List471.Name: Twilight Armor II
List471.Comment: Made of dark matter, this shield can easily deflect any weaponry. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>215</font> points to shields and absorbs <font color='#00FF00'>175</font> damage at its current level.
List471.Comment2: Requires Twilight Armor I research to unlock.

List472.Name: Twilight Armor III
List472.Comment: Made of dark matter, this shield can easily deflect any weaponry. Adds <font color='#00FF00'>315</font> points to shields and absorbs <font color='#00FF00'>225</font> damage at its current level.

List473.Name: Voidmaker I
List473.Comment: Despite its small size, the Voidmaker creates black holes that can pull planets into its abyss.
List473.Comment2: Requires a Voidmaker Blueprint and Helio Sword III research to unlock.

List474.Name: Voidmaker II
List474.Comment: Despite its small size, the Voidmaker creates black holes that can pull stars into its abyss.

List475.Name: Voidmaker III
List475.Comment: Despite its small size, the Voidmaker creates black holes that can pull galaxies into its abyss.

List476.Name: Fissure Cannon I
List476.Comment: Powered by nuclear fissures, the Fissure Cannon is deadliest at close range.
List476.Comment2: Requires a Fissure Cannon Blueprint and Dire Brand III research to unlock.

List477.Name: Fissure Cannon II
List477.Comment: Powered by nuclear fissures, the Fissure Cannon is deadliest at close range.

List478.Name: Fissure Cannon III
List478.Comment: Powered by nuclear fissures, the Fissure Cannon is deadliest at close range.

List479.Name: Ion Flare I
List479.Comment: Fires high-energy beams that can pierce through any armor.
List479.Comment2: Requires a Ion Flare Blueprint and Odd Eye III research to unlock.

List480.Name: Ion Flare II
List480.Comment: Fires high-energy beams that can pierce through any armor.

List481.Name: Ion Flare III
List481.Comment: Fires high-energy beams that can pierce through any armor.

List482.Name: Plasma Beacon I
List482.Comment: When used in railguns, the plasma beam can sizzle through enemy ships and deal devastating damage.
List482.Comment2: Requires a Plasma Beacon Blueprint and Dark Horizon III research to unlock.

List483.Name: Plasma Beacon II
List483.Comment: When used in railguns, the plasma beam can sizzle through enemy ships and deal devastating damage.

List484.Name: Plasma Beacon III
List484.Comment: When used in railguns, the plasma beam can sizzle through enemy ships and deal devastating damage.

List485.Name: Venom Launcher I

List485.Comment2: Requires a Venom Launcher Blueprint and Zero Event III research to unlock.

List486.Name: Venom Launcher II
List486.Comment: Fires a swarm of acidic shells that can eat through any metal used in ship construction.

List487.Name: Venom Launcher III
List487.Comment: Fires a swarm of acidic shells that can eat through any metal used in ship construction.

List488.Name: Patriot Launcher I

List497.Name: Hybrid Defense System I
List497.Comment: Created by the brightest minds of the Federation, the Hybrid Defense System usually serves as a ship's last line of defense. At this level, it negates DMG by 4%, increases Staility by 100%, and strengthens Overall Ship Defense by 1. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List497.Comment2: Requires a Hybrid Defense System Blueprint and Icarus Control System research to unlock.

List498.Name: Hybrid Defense System II
List498.Comment: Created by the brightest minds of the Federation, the Hybrid Defense System usually serves as a ship's last line of defense. At this level, it negates DMG by 6%, increases Staility by 150%, and strengthens Overall Ship Defense by 2. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List498.Comment2: Requires Hybrid Defense System I research.

List499.Name: Hybrid Defense System III
List499.Comment: Created by the brightest minds of the Federation, the Hybrid Defense System usually serves as a ship's last line of defense. At this level, it negates DMG by 8%, increases Staility by 200%, and strengthens Overall Ship Defense by 3. Only 1 module of this type may be installed onto a ship.
List499.Comment2: Requires Hybrid Defense System II research.
